text: int main ( ) { int t ; scanf ( "%d" , & t ) ; while ( t -- ) { long n , i ; scanf ( "%ld" , & n ) ; long long a [ n ] , count [ n ] , total = 0 ; for ( i = 0 ; i < n ; i ++ ) { scanf ( "%lld" , & a [ i ] ) ; count [ i ] = 1 ; } for ( i = 1 ; i < n ; i ++ ) { if ( a [ i - 1 ] <= a [ i ] ) count [ i ] = count [ i - 1 ] + 1 ; } for ( i = 0 ; i < n ; i ++ ) { total += count [ i ] ; } printf ( "%lld" , total ) ; printf ( "\n" ) ; } return 0 ; }
